title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 17 2021
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 17 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Netanyahu defends bombing of building in Gaza, which housed both AP and Hamas. Palestinian terrorists always use civilians as human shields. Rush tells the hard truth: Diplomacy will never solve the dispute between Israel and the Palestinians. To Hamas and Palestinians, peace is a lull in the normal state of life, which is war against Israel. Biden administration absent from Middle East violence. UN talking ceasefire. Hamas always benefits from ceasefires because they have time to regroup. Hamas in league with Iran, does not want peace, they want to wipe out Israel. New CDC recommendations are a mess. All the people who told us Trump didn't know what he was doing now seem like they don't look like they know what they're doing. Violence in Chicago. Classic Rush monologue: A tiger is a tiger.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Tiger that was on the loose in Houston caught. Rush: A tiger is a tiger. Caller on Biden foreign policy. The Preakness. Wild Horses. Rush on liberals always getting credit for good intentions. Rush knocks it out of the park on critical race theory. Caller: How did a guy on bail for murder get a tiger?


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Penn State replaces gendered pronouns. Rush's unforgettable analysis of the socialist convention. Ransomware pipeline shutdown still adversely impacts millions. Rush on liberal hatred for oil. Rush's Monday Musings: One man can make a difference. Biden's inflation, shortages. EIB High Note: Kids celebrate Canadian hockey player's hat trick. Space Force commander fired for criticizing Marxist infiltration in the military.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
